text:
The AirDrop feature offers a special token that can be claimed by users through a unique code format. This code will be provided via Telegram, and users can easily claim their ₹100 by entering the code within the app. Please note, this offer is limited to a select number of users only. Once the code is claimed, the ₹100 will be credited directly to the user's wallet. This exclusive opportunity ensures a smooth, secure, and fast process for users to receive their reward, while maintaining transparency and real-time updates on the transaction status. Join our Telegram channel and receive your exclusive AirDrop code! 

AirDrop is available daily, but only for a limited time. The code will be shared on Telegram in the form of a unique code. Users can claim the ₹100 by entering this code within the app, provided the code hasn’t expired or reached its limit. A user can only claim the code once, and the code can be used by other users as well.

Additionally, please note:
The minimum withdrawal amount is ₹550.
There are no transfer fees, no charges, and no TDS up to ₹15,000.
For amounts exceeding ₹15,000, charges will apply, ranging between 10% based on the withdrawal amount.
After initiating a withdrawal, the payment will be processed within 48 hours maximum.
